All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Day
Graphical entry point for information that defines a single day.
DayEditor
Graphical editor for defining Day objects.
Duration
Represents a duration of time between a start and end point.
EditorEntry
Stores information that can be edited or viewed graphically about a particular type of data used by the generator.
EditorList<E extends EditorEntry>
Stores a list of EditorEntrys that can be edited by the user.
EditorViewport<E extends EditorEntry>
Graphical viewport to handle the display of an EditorList to which entries of a specific type can be added.
FontRenderer
Renders custom fonts for cells in a JComboBox.
InfoEditor
Graphical editor for the school start date, end date, and timezone.
Interval
Represents a closed interval with a discrete minimum and maximum.
JSONViewer
Graphical viewer for the final JSON output.
Menu
Manages the application menu bar for the desktop version.
OSPath
Provides some useful functions for manipulating pathnames in an operating system conscious manner.
PCDesktopApp
Main class for the Period-Countdown desktop application.
Period
Graphical entry point for information that defines a single period.
PeriodEditor
Graphical editor for defining Period objects.
SchoolAPI
Interface for accessing information derived from the school json file.
SchoolJson
Defines the object representation for the school json file as well as important constants.
SchoolPeriod
Represents the concept of a block of time during the school year defined by the json file.
SchoolYear
Represents all the information in the school json file in a more accessible format.
Screen
Graphical interface for the desktop application.
Tools
Miscellaneous tools that do not fit into any other util class.
UserAPI
Interface for accessing user-editable information from the user json file.
UserJson
Defines the object representation for the user json file as well as important constants.
UserJsonSchoolDef
Defines a school used by the user json file.
UserPeriod
Represents the user-defined data in a school period.
UTCTime
Represents a coordinated moment in time, in UTC.
Week
Graphical entry point for information that defines a single week.
WeekEditor
Graphical editor for defining Week objects.
WeekException
Graphical entry point for information that defines a single week exception.
WeekExceptionEditor
Graphical editor for defining WeekException objects.
Wizard
Main class for the Period-Countdown school data JSON generator.
WizardBuilder
Performs real-time validation of data entered by the user and converts the object representation of school data to a JSON string.
WizardManager
Static manager for all the data entered by the user.
